meanings.sent1: The farmer had a yeomanly attitude towards hard work.
meanings.sent2: The knight displayed a yeomanly sense of duty towards his kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed a yeomanly determination to gather all the nuts in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her yeomanly dedication to her family was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The dog's yeomanly loyalty to its owner was heartwarming.

meanings.sent1: He worked yeomanly in the fields from dawn till dusk.
meanings.sent2: She sang yeomanly at the village festival, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The children played yeomanly in the park, full of energy and joy.
meanings.sent4: The team fought yeomanly against their opponents, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The chef cooked yeomanly, creating delicious dishes for the guests.
